title: Ep. 1013 - The Mark Of The Beast Announced At World Economic Forum
description:
The World Economic Forum plans our dystopian future, State Farm backs down from transing the kids, and demagogues exploit an horrific tragedy to score cheap points.

Watch last night’s exclusive interview with Dr. Robert Malone and Candace by becoming a Daily Wire member: https://utm.io/ueBTu

Join Michael and the Daily Wire for Backstage Live At The Ryman on June 29th. Get your tickets now: https://utm.io/uezFr

NBA star Jonathan Isaac has withstood immense pressure to conform to popular social issues. He wrote a book about his experience and it is available now: https://utm.io/ud96e

—
